intro: Cynanchum danguyanum, commonly known as the Chinese milkvetch, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asclepiadaceae and is characterized by its erect, branched stems and opposite leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers arranged in clusters, which bloom in the summer months. It is often found in dry, rocky habitats and is known for its medicinal properties in traditional Chinese medicine. The plant contains various bioactive compounds that have been studied for their potential health benefits.
